meanings.sent1: My grandmother is an agers who loves to tell stories about her youth.
meanings.sent2: As we grow older, we all become agers and gain wisdom through experience.
meanings.sent3: The agers at the retirement home always have the best advice for the younger residents.
meanings.sent4: Time is a relentless agers, marking its passage on our faces and bodies.
meanings.sent5: The agers in the family album remind us of the passage of time and the beauty of aging gracefully.

meanings.sent1: With each passing year, we can see the effects of agers on our bodies and minds.
meanings.sent2: The agers bring about changes in our lives, teaching us valuable lessons along the way.
meanings.sent3: Some people try to fight the inevitable agers with cosmetic procedures and treatments.
meanings.sent4: Like a slow but steady river, the agers flow through our lives, shaping who we become.
meanings.sent5: Embracing the natural agers can lead to a more fulfilling and contented life.

meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to three months.
meanings.sent1: The farmers planted their crops at the beginning of the agers to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent2: The project deadline was set for the end of the agers, giving us three months to complete it.
meanings.sent3: In the ancient calendar, each season was divided into four agers for easier tracking of time.
meanings.sent4: The agers of the year passed quickly, marked by the changing colors of the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The agers of winter seemed to drag on endlessly, with each day feeling colder than the last.
